purpose: Assist healthcare professionals, researchers, and patients with medical diagnostics and research through a multi-agent chatbot system.
principle: Utilizes generative AI and multi-agent coordination to process medical images and provide diagnostic assistance, leveraging technologies like LangChain and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation).
reusability: Designed to be integrated into healthcare systems via APIs, supporting modular agent configurations and custom medical datasets.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited coverage of medical conditions, and requires validation for clinical use.
name: Multi-Agent-Medical-Assistant

highlight: GenAI powered multi-agent system for medical diagnostics and healthcare research assistance.
